comment:
* YuvImage contains YUV data and provides a method that compresses a region of
 * the YUV data to a Jpeg. The YUV data should be provided as a single byte
 * array irrespective of the number of image planes in it.
 * Currently only ImageFormat.NV21 and ImageFormat.YUY2 are supported.
 *
 * To compress a rectangle region in the YUV data, users have to specify the
 * region by left, top, width and height.

variables.name: WORKING_COMPRESS_STORAGE
variables.comment:
* Number of bytes of temp storage we use for communicating between the
     * native compressor and the java OutputStream.

variables.name: mFormat
variables.comment: * The YUV format as defined in {@link ImageFormat}.

variables.name: mData
variables.comment:
* The raw YUV data.
     * In the case of more than one image plane, the image planes must be
     * concatenated into a single byte array.

variables.name: mStrides
variables.comment: * The number of row bytes in each image plane.

variables.name: mHeight
variables.comment: * The height of the the image.

methods.name: public boolean compressToJpeg(Rect rectangle, int quality, OutputStream stream)
methods.comment:
* Compress a rectangle region in the YuvImage to a jpeg.
     * Only ImageFormat.NV21 and ImageFormat.YUY2
     * are supported for now.
     *
     * @param rectangle The rectangle region to be compressed. The medthod checks if rectangle is
     *                  inside the image. Also, the method modifies rectangle if the chroma pixels
     *                  in it are not matched with the luma pixels in it.
     * @param quality   Hint to the compressor, 0-100. 0 meaning compress for
     *                  small size, 100 meaning compress for max quality.
     * @param stream    OutputStream to write the compressed data.
     * @return          True if the compression is successful.
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if rectangle is invalid; quality is not within [0,
     *                  100]; or stream is null.

methods.name: public int getYuvFormat()
methods.comment: * @return the YUV format as defined in {@link ImageFormat}.

methods.name: public int[] getStrides()
methods.comment: * @return the number of row bytes in each image plane.

methods.name: private int[] calculateStrides(int width, int format)
private static native boolean nativeCompressToJpeg(byte[] oriYuv, int format, int width, int height, int[] offsets, int[] strides, int quality, OutputStream stream, byte[] tempStorage)

methodNames: public boolean compressToJpeg(Rect rectangle, int quality, OutputStream stream)
private int[] calculateStrides(int width, int format)
private static native boolean nativeCompressToJpeg(byte[] oriYuv, int format, int width, int height, int[] offsets, int[] strides, int quality, OutputStream stream, byte[] tempStorage)
